projects: [{"title":"Chat-App","start_date":"Dec 2023","end_date":"Jan 2024","description":"Designed and implemented a cutting-edge chat application using the MERN(MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) stack, providing users with aseamless and responsive real-time communication experience.• Leveraged socket.io to create a robust and efficient messaging system, ensuringinstant message delivery and enhancing the overall user engagement• Implemented real-time features such as typing indicators and instantnotifications, enhancing the interactivity and user-friendliness of the chatapplication.• Implemented a comprehensive logging and error-handling system to monitorand troubleshoot issues effectively, resulting in a more stable and resilient chatplatform"},{"title":"ECOMMERCE WEBSITE","start_date":"Jul 2023","end_date":"Sep 2023","description":"A dynamic e-commerce platform using MERN stack. User-friendly UI, secure payments, optimized backend and user satisfaction.• Successfully integrated popular payment gateways, including Stripe, enablingsecure online transactions for users.• Both frontend and backend development, crafting engaging user interfaceswith React and managing server-side logic with Express.js and Node.js.• Implemented secure user authentication and authorization mechanisms,enhancing website security and providing personalized experiences forregistered users.• Designed and optimized the database architecture using MongoDB, ensuringefficient data flow, and maintaining data integrity."},{"title":"CodePen Clone","start_date":"Apr 2023","end_date":"Jun 2023","description":"A CodePen clone web application, providing users with a platform to write,test, and share HTML, CSS, and JavaScript code snippets in real-time"},{"title":"Todo-List","start_date":"May 2022","end_date":"Jul 2022","description":"Spearheaded the development of a Todo List application leveraging theMERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React, Node.js) stack.
